TopicTitle: What happened to the helmet light?

Articles.Content: I'm really missing it. Is there a "work around"?
What helmet light? The one activated by pressing L while on EVA?

Spam the L key. For some reason a significant percentage of L keystrokes are getting eaten by some hungry kraken. The closer you are to a high part-count ship, the more L keystrokes get eaten. (It also seems to depend on how powerful your CPU is.) If you try to change the key binding, then that key will get eaten instead.

Yeah, I've tried that but no uh uh. Even tried machine gunning the L key until my finger tip was sore. I just don't understand how a little feature like that (that's been in the game a long time) gets screwed up.

This problem came along with 1.1.3 and I suppose it won't get fixed until 1.2 gets here. Oh well, I guess the Squad giveth, and the Squad taketh away

Isn't it mod related?

duh, I forgot

It's nothing to do with mods, it's a bug in the stock game and Squad knows about it.

It's affected by game speed (rate of updates).  The problem gets worse when things slow down.  For example, I didn't notice the problem at all the entire time I was playing 1.1.3 ... until I went to fly my big 450-part Jool mission, and the game slowed down, and now I can't get helmet lights to work at all when they're within range of that big ship.

Basically we just need to wait until the next patch so that Squad can fix it.
